data.title: Upper Shirley Vineyards
data.meta_description: Contact Upper Shirley Vineyards in Charles City, with weddings starting at $10,108 for 50 guests. Customize your own price and special offers.
data.text:
Upper Shirley Vineyards accommodates a maximum of 300 guests. Couples may choose to wed inside or outside on the waterfront ceremony lawn. This venue offers 14,000 square feet of indoor space inside their Low Country winery.

Couples who select Upper Shirley Vineyards to exchange vows benefit from a variety of services and amenities. Items include: Indoor and outdoor settings, event rentals, and cleanup.

All cuisine is lovingly prepared by our in-house, seasoned culinary team. Meals are presented via the following serving styles: Hor d'oeuvres, station dinner, and plated dinner.

Upper Shirley Vineyards offers bar services and various wedding decor items upon request. Interested couples may choose from the following: Bartender(s), cocktail reception, Champagne toast, house wine, open bar, barware, china, flatware, glassware, linens, tables, and chairs.
